text: Staying updated on the complexities of the Ukraine crisis 🌎: China's Xi proposes 4 priorities for resolution 💡, while US Treasury Sec. Yellen urges House to pass a Ukraine aid bill 🇺🇸. Amidst debate over legal aid channels, she emphasizes manageable risks when acting as a united G7 group 🌍. Constructive dialogue and unity are key to addressing global challenges 💪
